name: YHA Sydney Central
description:
Play and stay in YHA Sydney Central! In a spectacular heritage listed building located directly opposite Central Station

This is traveller's accommodation at its finest, boasting a rooftop pool and, a sunny outdoor area with panoramic views of the city with free, fast Wi-Fi all throughout the property. 

Extensive facilities include 2 large well equipped 24-hour kitchens, spacious dining and lounge areas, laundries, cinema, secure lockers, parking, 24 hour access, meeting rooms, group facilities, YHA Travel and Tours desk, cafe, vending machines, and Schirrmo's Bar. 

The new Sydney light rail line stops right across the hostel and the train station is 100 metres away, making it very easy for guests to travel through the city to the Harbour and much further away.

Our famous activities program includes walking tours, movie nights with free popcorn and our legendary Aussie BBQs. 
Winner - 'Best Backpacker Accommodation of the Decade' - need we say more?
hostelworldSays: Sydney Central YHA is a super clean, spacious hostel that continues to receive high ratings, especially for its location. It's set next to the trams, close to trains at Central Station and is a short walk from Paddy's Market and Chinatown. Hostelworld reviewers tell us that this is a fantastic place buzzing with international traveller's, things to do and ways to meet other people. We particularly like their two big kitchens, ensuring that there's still enough space for everyone to cook in this large hostel.

groupInformation.terms:
The full balance is required on the date of booking,
prior to arrival.
If these payments are not received on time, YHA reserves the
right to cancel your booking.
groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
In the event that you have to cancel your booking, the following
cancellation policy will apply:
• More than 21 days prior to arrival, 25% of the total
balance (minimum $250) will be retained as a cancellation
fee.
• Between 15 and 21 days prior to arrival, 75% of the total
balance will be retained as a cancellation fee.
• Within 14 days of arrival, no refunds are available.

If there is a decrease in group numbers of more than 10%
of the total amount, the above cancellation fees will apply –
unless it is within 14 days of arrival. In this case, there will
be no refund.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
A bond may be required from group guests – at the
Manager’s discretion.
YHA reserves the right at all times and without prior notice
to stop accommodating a group if one or more group
members contravenes property policies. No refunds will be
given in these circumstances.
YHA reserves the right to terminate a booking without any
obligation to pay compensation if there is sufficient cause to
believe that the nature of the group’s meeting at the property is
different than could reasonably have been expected, based on
the group’s request or on the character of the group, and that
YHA would not have entered into the agreement had it known
the true nature of the intended meeting. Should YHA choose
to exercise this right after such meeting has commenced at the
Property, the group’s payment for the services rendered to that
point will be retained and the balance paid will be refunded

houseRules.notes:
Check In: from 2.00pm. 
Check Out: by 10.00am

Please inform YHA Sydney Central in advance of your expected arrival time.

Guests are required to show photo identification and credit card upon check-in. 

We require taking a profile photo of all guests staying in shared rooms or private rooms with a shared bathroom. If you do not wish to have your photo taken, we will not be able to accommodate you.

Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Guests under the age of 18 can only check in with a parent or legal guardian.

The supervision of guests under 18 years of age remains the responsibility of their parent or legal guardian whilst at a YHA property. Guests under 18 years of age are not permitted to stay in Co-living shared dormitory rooms, they can only be accommodated in private rooms. For further information on the YHA child safety policy please contact the property directly.

categories.category_description: This hostel has confirmed that they have implemented a sustainability strategy that will lead them to certification. They’ve committed to prioritising environmental, cultural and community best practices. They may also meet a Global Sustainable Tourism Council recognised standard.
